interfaces.name: Paginated
Product
interfaces.sourceCode:
export interface Product {
  id: number;
  name: string;
  price: number;
  created_at: string;
  owner_id: number;
  ratings: { user_id: number; value: number }[];
}

export const products: Product[] = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: 'Stylo Bleu',
    price: 2.5,
    created_at: '2025-01-10T10:00:00Z',
    owner_id: 10,
    ratings: [{ user_id: 2, value: 4 }],

injectables.name: ShopApiService

methods.name: getProductRating
methods.description:
Get rating for a specific product

Example :
this.shopApi.getProductRating(1).subscribe(rating => {
  console.log('Average rating:', rating.avg_rating);
  console.log('Number of reviews:', rating.count);
});

jsdoctags.comment: this.shopApi.getProductRating(1).subscribe(rating => { console.log('Average rating:', rating.avg_rating); console.log('Number of reviews:', rating.count); });

methods.name: getProducts
methods.description:
Get list of products with optional filters

Example :
this.shopApi.getProducts({
  page: 0,
  pageSize: 6,
  minRating: 3,
  ordering: 'price'
}).subscribe(response => {
  console.log('Total products:', response.count);
  console.log('Current page:', response.results);
});

jsdoctags.comment: this.shopApi.getProducts({ page: 0, pageSize: 6, minRating: 3, ordering: 'price' }).subscribe(response => { console.log('Total products:', response.count); console.log('Current page:', response.results); });

methods.name: login
methods.description:
Login with username and password

Example :
this.shopApi.login('demo', 'demo').subscribe(tokens => {
  console.log('Access token:', tokens.access);
  console.log('Refresh token:', tokens.refresh);
});

jsdoctags.comment: this.shopApi.login('demo', 'demo').subscribe(tokens => { console.log('Access token:', tokens.access); console.log('Refresh token:', tokens.refresh); });

methods.name: refreshToken
methods.description:
Refresh access token using refresh token

Example :
this.shopApi.refreshToken(refreshToken).subscribe(response => {
  console.log('New access token:', response.access);
});

injectables.description:
ShopApiService

HTTP client for all API interactions with the backend.

Base URL: http://localhost:8000/api/

Endpoints:

  • POST /api/auth/token/ - Login
  • POST /api/auth/token/refresh/ - Refresh access token
  • GET /api/products/ - List products with filters
  • GET /api/products/:id/rating/ - Get product rating
injectables.rawdescription:
ShopApiService

HTTP client for all API interactions with the backend.

Base URL: http://localhost:8000/api/

Endpoints:
- POST /api/auth/token/ - Login
- POST /api/auth/token/refresh/ - Refresh access token
- GET /api/products/ - List products with filters
- GET /api/products/:id/rating/ - Get product rating

interceptors.name: AuthInterceptor
interceptors.description:
AuthInterceptor (Class-based)

Automatically appends the Authorization header with Bearer token to all HTTP requests when an access token is available in the store.

Note: The functional version below is recommended for Angular 15+
interceptors.rawdescription:
AuthInterceptor (Class-based)

Automatically appends the Authorization header with Bearer token
to all HTTP requests when an access token is available in the store.

Note: The functional version below is recommended for Angular 15+

components.name: App
AppPlaceholderComponent
components.template:
My Shop

Welcome to your shopping experience

@if (isAuthenticated$ | async) {
✓ Authenticated
} @else {
Not signed in
}

🔐 Sign In

Access your account with demo credentials (demo/demo)

🛍️ Shop Products

Browse our collection with filters and sorting

⭐ Check Ratings

See detailed ratings for any product by ID
components.sourceCode:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { RouterLink } from '@angular/router'; import { Store } from '@ngrx/store'; import { selectIsAuthenticated } from './state/auth/auth.selectors'; import * as AuthActions from './state/auth/auth.actions'; import { MatButtonModule } from '@angular/material/button'; import { MatCardModule } from '@angular/material/card'; @Component({ standalone: true, selector: 'app-placeholder', imports: [CommonModule, RouterLink, MatButtonModule, MatCardModule], template: `

My Shop

Welcome to your shopping experience

@if (isAuthenticated$ | async) {
✓ Authenticated
} @else {
Not signed in
}

🔐 Sign In

Access your account with demo credentials (demo/demo)

🛍️ Shop Products

Browse our collection with filters and sorting

⭐ Check Ratings

See detailed ratings for any product by ID

`, }) export class AppPlaceholderComponent { isAuthenticated$: any; constructor(private store: Store) { this.isAuthenticated$ = this.store.select(selectIsAuthenticated); } logout(): void { this.store.dispatch(AuthActions.logout()); } }

components.name: HeaderComponent

Acme

Welcome, {{ user.name }}!
components.sourceCode:
import { Component, Input, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { ButtonComponent } from './button.component'; import type { User } from './user'; @Component({ selector: 'storybook-header', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, ButtonComponent], template: `

Acme

Welcome, {{ user.name }}!
`, styleUrls: ['./header.css'], }) export class HeaderComponent { @Input() user: User | null = null; @Output() onLogin = new EventEmitter(); @Output() onLogout = new EventEmitter(); @Output() onCreateAccount = new EventEmitter(); }

components.name: PageComponent
components.template:
Pages in Storybook

We recommend building UIs with a component-driven process starting with atomic components and ending with pages.

Render pages with mock data. This makes it easy to build and review page states without needing to navigate to them in your app. Here are some handy patterns for managing page data in Storybook:

  • Use a higher-level connected component. Storybook helps you compose such data from the "args" of child component stories
  • Assemble data in the page component from your services. You can mock these services out using Storybook.

Get a guided tutorial on component-driven development at Storybook tutorials . Read more in the docs .

Tip Adjust the width of the canvas with the Viewports addon in the toolbar
components.sourceCode:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { HeaderComponent } from './header.component'; import type { User } from './user'; @Component({ selector: 'storybook-page', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, HeaderComponent], template: `

Pages in Storybook

We recommend building UIs with a component-driven process starting with atomic components and ending with pages.

Render pages with mock data. This makes it easy to build and review page states without needing to navigate to them in your app. Here are some handy patterns for managing page data in Storybook:

  • Use a higher-level connected component. Storybook helps you compose such data from the "args" of child component stories
  • Assemble data in the page component from your services. You can mock these services out using Storybook.

Get a guided tutorial on component-driven development at Storybook tutorials . Read more in the docs .

Tip Adjust the width of the canvas with the Viewports addon in the toolbar
`, styleUrls: ['./page.css'], }) export class PageComponent { user: User | null = null; doLogout() { this.user = null; } doLogin() { this.user = { name: 'Jane Doe' }; } doCreateAccount() { this.user = { name: 'Jane Doe' }; } }

Products

Filters
Page Page Size Min Rating Sort By None Price (Low to High) Price (High to Low) Name (A-Z)

} @if (error$ | async; as error) {

{{ error }}

@for (product of products; track product.id) { {{ product.name }}

${{ product.price }}

Created: {{ product.created_at | date: 'short' }}

★ {{ product.avgRating }}/5
} @empty {

No products found

}
}

variables.name: API
variables.defaultValue: '/api'

variables.name: appConfig
variables.defaultValue:
{
  providers: [
    provideBrowserGlobalErrorListeners(),
    provideZoneChangeDetection({ eventCoalescing: true }),
    provideRouter(routes),
    provideHttpClient(withInterceptors([authInterceptor])),
    provideStore({ auth: authReducer, products: productsReducer }),
    provideEffects([AuthEffects, ProductsEffects]),
    provideStoreDevtools({ maxAge: 25, logOnly: !isDevMode() }),
  ],
}

variables.name: productsReducer
refreshToken
variables.defaultValue:
createAction(
  '[Auth] Refresh Token',
  props<{ refreshToken: string }>()
)

variables.name: refreshTokenFailure
variables.defaultValue:
createAction(
  '[Auth] Refresh Token Failure',
  props<{ error: string }>()
)

variables.name: refreshTokenSuccess
variables.defaultValue:
createAction(
  '[Auth] Refresh Token Success',
  props<{ access: string }>()
)

variables.name: routes
variables.defaultValue:
[
  { path: '', component: HomeComponent, pathMatch: 'full' },
  { path: 'login', component: LoginPageComponent },
  {
    path: 'shop',
    canActivate: [authGuard],
    children: [
      { path: 'products', component: ProductsPageComponent },
      { path: 'rating', component: ProductRatingPageComponent },
    ],
  },
  { path: 'dev', component: DevIndexComponent },
  { path: 'dev/auth', component: DevAuthComponent },
  { path: 'dev/products', component: DevProductsComponent },
  { path: 'dev/products/:id/rating', component: DevProductRatingComponent },
  { path: 'app', component: AppPlaceholderComponent },
  { path: '**', redirectTo: '' },
]

variables.name: selectAccessToken
variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  selectAuthFeature,
  (state: AuthState) => state.access
)

variables.name: selectAllProducts
variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  selectProductsFeature,
  (state: ProductsState) => state.items
)

variables.name: selectAuthError
variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  selectAuthFeature,
  (state: AuthState) => state.error
)

variables.name: selectAuthFeature
variables.defaultValue: createFeatureSelector<AuthState>('auth')

variables.name: selectAuthLoading
variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  selectAuthFeature,
  (state: AuthState) => state.loading
)

variables.name: selectIsAuthenticated
variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  selectAccessToken,
  (access: string | null) => !!access
)

variables.name: selectLastFilters
variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  selectProductsFeature,
  (state: ProductsState) => state.lastFilters
)

variables.name: selectProductsCount
variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  selectProductsFeature,
  (state: ProductsState) => state.count
)

variables.name: selectProductsError
variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  selectProductsFeature,
  (state: ProductsState) => state.error
)

variables.name: selectProductsFeature
variables.defaultValue: createFeatureSelector<ProductsState>('products')

variables.name: selectProductsLoading
variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  selectProductsFeature,
  (state: ProductsState) => state.loading
)

variables.name: selectRating
variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  selectProductsFeature,
  (state: ProductsState) => state.rating
)

variables.name: selectRatingError
variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  selectProductsFeature,
  (state: ProductsState) => state.ratingError
)

variables.name: selectRatingLoading
variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  selectProductsFeature,
  (state: ProductsState) => state.ratingLoading
)

variables.name: selectRefreshToken
variables.defaultValue:
createSelector(
  selectAuthFeature,
  (state: AuthState) => state.refresh
)

variables.name: worker
variables.defaultValue: setupWorker(...handlers)

src/mocks/handlers.ts.name: handlers

src/app/app.config.ts.name: appConfig
src/app/app.config.ts.defaultValue:
{
  providers: [
    provideBrowserGlobalErrorListeners(),
    provideZoneChangeDetection({ eventCoalescing: true }),
    provideRouter(routes),
    provideHttpClient(withInterceptors([authInterceptor])),
    provideStore({ auth: authReducer, products: productsReducer }),
    provideEffects([AuthEffects, ProductsEffects]),
    provideStoreDevtools({ maxAge: 25, logOnly: !isDevMode() }),
  ],
}

src/app/guards/auth.guard.ts.name: authGuard

src/app/services/auth.interceptor.ts.name: authInterceptor

initialState

  count: 0,
  loading: false,
  error: null,
  lastFilters: null,
  rating: null,
  ratingLoading: false,
  ratingError: null,
}

src/app/app.routes.ts.name: routes
src/app/app.routes.ts.defaultValue:
[
  { path: '', component: HomeComponent, pathMatch: 'full' },
  { path: 'login', component: LoginPageComponent },
  {
    path: 'shop',
    canActivate: [authGuard],
    children: [
      { path: 'products', component: ProductsPageComponent },
      { path: 'rating', component: ProductRatingPageComponent },
    ],
  },
  { path: 'dev', component: DevIndexComponent },
  { path: 'dev/auth', component: DevAuthComponent },
  { path: 'dev/products', component: DevProductsComponent },
  { path: 'dev/products/:id/rating', component: DevProductRatingComponent },
  { path: 'app', component: AppPlaceholderComponent },
  { path: '**', redirectTo: '' },
]
